--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Rodimus has a painful flashback of the battle at Autobot City in 
2005. He sees the original death of Optimus Prime at the hands of 
Megatron. Rodimus also remembers the part he played. H was too dumb 
in his youth and tried to get involved int he fight. It was he who 
gave Megatron the chance to kill Prime. Rodimus snaps back to reality.
> 
> "Yes, you are right. I can't be fooled. I will plan for some sort 
of trick. I remember what they can do. I was there when Optimus Prime 
battled Megatron, and I with Optimus when he died."
